entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Collingwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:04 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 08:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -8.7°C
Wind: S 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 late this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 19.
